page.title: 11Industry and Jobs 2
page.content: Most of the working population travel to their places of work.These are primarily in the larger towns such as Whitehaven which has a relatively large chemical works called Marchon. The town is also the main shopping and services centre for the area and therefore attracts most of the associated labour. Apart from farming therefore the only businesses are those who are self employed and work from their home address.Examples of this sort being a joiner,an architect and a surveyor. The largest single employer in this part of the county is the nuclear power station at Sellafield.A good many of the residents commute each day to the complex and are employed either by B.N.F.L. or one of the many sub contractors working on site.
